contentrichtext.text: '''PCC''' may stand for: {{TOC right}} == Biology and chemistry == * [[Pheochromocytoma]], a neuroendocrine tumor * [[Precipitated calcium carbonate]] * [[Propionyl-CoA carboxylase]] * [[Pyridinium chlorochromate]] * [[pyrolytic chromium carbide coating]] by vacuum deposition ==Fiction== *"psychic character class" in [[Palladium Books]] games like [[Nightbane]] and [[Beyond the Supernatural]] *[[Pico x CoCo x Chico]] ==Organizations and companies== * [[Pacific Coast Conference]], a defunct United States college athletic conference * [[Pacific Conference of Churches]], the regional ecumenical organization in the Pacific region * [[Pakistan Christian Congress]] * [[Palestinian Conciliation Commission]] * [[Panama Canal Commission]] * ''Partido Comunista de Canarias'', the [[Communist Party of the Canaries]] * ''[[Partido Comunista de Cuba]]'', the Communist Party of Cuba * ''[[Partido Comunista Colombiano]]'', the Colombian Communist Party * ''[[Partit dels i les Comunistes de Catalunya]]'', Party of the Communists of Catalonia * [[Perth City Council]] * [[Pacific Coffee Company]] * [[People's Computer Company]] * [[Clef Club of Jazz and Performing Arts]] * [[Plainfield Curling Club]] * [[Philippine Collegiate Championship]] * [[Plains Conservation Center]] * [[Polynesian Cultural Center]] * [[Power Computing]] Corporation * [[Porirua City Council]], New Zealand * [[Power Corporation of Canada]] * [[Pradesh Congress Committee]], the provincial committee of the Congress Party in India * [[Precision Castparts Corp.]] in Portland, Oregon * [[Presbyterian Church in Canada]] * [[Press Complaints Commission]], a voluntary regulatory body for British printed newspapers and magazines * [[Printed Circuit Corporation]] * ''[[Primeiro Comando da Capital]]'', a Brazilian prison gang-terrorist group * [[PCC Natural Markets]], a food cooperative based in Seattle, Washington * [[Photo Card Café]], a greeting card company ===Colleges=== * [[Pabna Cadet College]] * [[Palmer College of Chiropractic]] * [[Pasadena City College]] * [[Penola Catholic College]] * [[Pensacola Christian College]] * [[Piedmont Community College]] * [[Pima Community College]] * [[Pitt Community College]] * [[Polk Community College]], former name of Polk State College * [[Portland Community College]] * [[Presentation College Chaguanas]] * [[Pueblo Community College]] * [[Punjab College of Commerce]] ===Governmental groups=== * [[Parochial church council]] * [[Patents County Court]] * [[Poison control center]] ==Software== * [[Portable C Compiler]] ==Other uses== * [[Pearson product-moment correlation coefficient|Pearson Correlation Coefficient]] * [[PCC streetcar]] (Presidents’ Conference Committee) * [[Parochial church council]] * [[Pen-centric Computing]] * [[Personal Car Communicator]] in Volvo Cars * [[Point of common coupling]], the point on the public electricity network at which customers are connected * [[Police clearance certificate]] * [[Police and Crime Commissioner]] in England and Wales, UK * [[Polymer City Chronicles]], a webcomic * [[Portland cement concrete]] * [[Pregnancy care center]] * [[Proof-Carrying Code]] * [[Prothrombin complex concentrate]] * [[RORO]], or Pure Car Carrier, a ship designed to transport automobiles * [[Phoenix ComiCon]] * [[Porsche Carrera Cup]] * [[C. Paul Phelps Correctional Center]] * [[Palestinian Central Council]] {{disambiguation}}
